p: CoVs are spread via person-to-person transmission [ 23]. The virus spreads mainly via sneezing and coughing as saliva droplets or nasal discharge, in addition to direct contact with infected people and indirect contact with surfaces immediately used by infected persons [ 2, 41, 42]. Airborne transmission may also be possible in specific conditions. Recently, SARS-CoV-2 was isolated from fecal swabs and the possibility of fecalâ€“oral transmission has been reported [ 43, 44].
